bill_title: add a segment of highway in Davison County to the state trunk highway system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to add a segment of highway in Davison County to the state trunk highway system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 31-4-162 be amended to read as follows: 31-4-162. The state trunk highway system includes the following in Aurora, Davison, Hanson, McCook, and Minnehaha counties: (1) From a point on U.S. Highway 281 south of Stickney near the southwest corner of section eighteen, township one hundred one north, range sixty-three west, thence east to the Davison County line near the southeast corner of section thirteen, township one hundred one north, range sixty-three west; (2) From a point on State Highway 37 south of Mitchell near the southwest corner of section fourteen, township one hundred one north, range sixty west, thence east via Bridgewater and Sioux Falls to the Iowa state line , thence easterly via Ethan, Bridgewater, and Sioux Falls to a point on the Iowa state line southeast of Rowena . 300 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.029 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
